events.name: Business of API Hackathon
events.about:
JOIN US IN BANGALORE THIS FEBRUARY! 

BUSINESS OF API HACKATHON

FEBRUARY 8, 2013    - 7: 30 PM ONWARDS

FEBRUARY 9, 2013    - 9:00 AM ONWARDS

FEBRUARY 10, 2013  - 10:00 AM ONWARDS

* Food and Beverages included*

Business of API Hackathon 

Learn best API practices from the some of best minds in the platform industry.Business of API will offer a  two and half day, comprehensive education cum hackathon, featuring three industry leading companies - LinkedIn, Twillio and Sendgrid, teaching you how to build winning API businesses, and achieve platform business goals. Attending this session will give you the knowledge, skill and more importantly confidence to create successful solutions for customers on API platforms.

Business of API Conference

APIs are creating a new wave - apps, development of new sales channels, as well as ways to engage partners and distribute content. Every company understands and wants to unlock the power of APIs - and open up the ecosystem to partners to propel their success. 

Developers world over are using their imagination to create value. And it is being created by extending business models into new channels or capturing new revenues using APIs. How do you learn about it and take advantage of this recent and rising trend? Welcome to the Business of APIs !
